sentences.sentence: Mr Ostler says machines may do the same to English.
sentences.translation: 奥斯特勒表示，机器可能会给英语造成同样的影响。

sentences.sentence: Yet Ostler takes the view that by around 2050 no global lingua franca will be needed.
sentences.translation: 但奥斯特勒的观点是：到2050年前后，世界将不再需要全球性的通用语言。

sentences.sentence: Mr Ostler is surely right about the nationalist limits to the spread of English as a mother-tongue.
sentences.translation: Ostler先生确信民族主义者限制英语作为母语的传播是做得对的。
